Those Aybam Medooz weren't much to
shout about, really. Keep them coming,
sweetie.

Such elegance in a skill...
I'll be looking forward to using
this one again. Tee hee hee...

Ahaha... Oh, I couldn't get enough of
those. Aren't there any more around
here?

I don't suggest picking a fight with us,
or you'll be sleeping with the Serprond.
...Oops, too late. What can you do?

Were you watching? Quite the form,
wouldn't you say?

Well, now that was a letdown.
What a waste of my skills...

I do hope you enjoyed that little
taste of darkness!

Well? Aren't you going to thank me for
defeating Parasite Aplacus for you?
Tee hee hee...

Have I flaunted my talents enough for
you? Hah!

I see you've got a few tricks up your
sleeve too, darling. Mind giving me a
piece of the action next time?

I find my arts to be delectably sordid.
Tee hee hee...

Ahahahaha! Drown in the depths of
darkness! Oh, I am enjoying myself!

Always willing to help my darling
Driver out in a pinch.
Truly, you complete me. Tee hee hee...

I did all that for you. Where's my
shower of compliments?

Pick on my dear sweet Driver and
you will feel Azami's wrath!

Do remember to heal. I don't want
a cadaver for a Driver.

It would break my heart to see you
perish here. Keep yourself alive,
won't you?

I am always here to protect you, but
please do look after yourself too.

I'll have you know you won't set one
foot near my darling Driver.
Tee hee hee... They did ask for it.

Oh, I could do anything with you and
I'd never get bored, darling.

Tee hee hee... It's like we're in
perfect sync...

Nothing can stand in the way of us
now, don't you agree?

What a gorgeous place... We should
come back some time, in private...

I do hope my message got through
to you. My sweet, sweet Driver...

Botany? Why, that's one of my
specialties.
Tee hee hee... The more you know...

You know me like the back of
your hand. Tee hee hee...

Why, you shouldn't have... If only this
moment could last forever... Haha...

You thinking of me alone is enough
to give me strength.

Well? Have you fallen for me yet?
Feel free to keep up the flattery...

Oh my... Have you decided
to reciprocate my feelings?
Tee hee hee...

Stay with me always, my beloved
Driver. Tee hee hee...

Turned outokay, huh?
Nice weapon, huh?

My lance is nice and pointy, huh?
Don't take my word for it... Here!
I gotta admit, that tastes great.
I think I got a little bit stronger there...

When's the next battle? I'll show you
what's what.

I'm feeling pretty chilled today.
Everything's going to be A-Okay!
Can't wait to try it out on someone...
That was nicely done, don't you think?

Ah, it's fun to swing a different
weapon around sometimes.

A nice piece... Yeah, I guess you can
never have too many weapons...
Can't wait for the next fight!
You wanna see the power of Earth?

Things go easier when you let me do
my thing.
What would you do without me?

Even I've got to admit, it's a great
feeling.

Oh, don't worry. I'll pay you back for
that. DOUBLE.
I'll show you what I can do.

Hey! Pay attention! Or I'll make you
pay attention...
What do you want? A medal?

I feel strong enough to go through
anything!
Don't get in my way.

Ah, people can really surprise you,
sometimes...

Lame... If I have to fight
Evileye Mambor again,
I think I'm going to hurl.
Getting stronger, huh?
So you need my help now?
Bo-ring!

Not much too it, when you
rub a little Benkei on it.
Okay, I gotta admit, that's kinda nice.
What's this? It's...beautiful...
Okay. Not bad.

Getting stronger?
Can't complain.

H-hey! I'm the lynchpin here. Not you!
Don't forget it!

Well, I guess you helped out a little
there. But not enough for a thank you.

A worthy foe. But I will defeat them
as many times as it takes.

I seem to be edging closer
toward mastery.

I promise a stirring
performance in the next
battle!

Somehow, I overcame that
mighty foe. I must admit,
it was not easy.

These Volff...
I cannot allow them to best me!
They were no match for me.

One can never truly perfect
one's craft.

A worthy foe makes for
great exercise.

I won't be outdone!
This is why I train so hard!

I'm sure you'll be able to
observe a little improvement
in my technique!

I feel power surging through
me, nose to tail!

I'll show you how to land
a stinging blow!

Behold the mighty
power of water!

You may rely on me for
support, always.

You will come to understand
the might of water.

I set myself against many
challenges, and gained much
experience.

Ah, delicious! A little treat
now and again boosts one's
strength, I'm sure.

I will demonstrate to you
my power.

As ever, I will use my power
for the good of all.

Without ample rest, there
can be no growth.

I feel that I've obtained a
little more strength.

Perhaps I can be of even
greater service to you now.

I promised my lady that I'd
suffer no one else to sit
upon my back.

It is experience that makes
us strong, is it not?

The power of water yields
to my yoke. It is at your
service.

Please, leave it to me, if
you hope for a favorable
outcome.

I think I'm getting the hang
of this...

I hope that my botany skills
will be of use to you all.
Ah, such fascinating trinkets.

Perhaps the time has come
for me to flaunt a little of
my erudition?

I'm sure I still have a little
room for improvement.

I still have room for
improvement. But, still, let
me show you what I can do.

I'm a little stronger now.
I hope my performance will
satisfy.

I feel that ultimate power is
within my grasp!

The foe was strong.
I became stronger.
I will be...stronger yet.

Many strong foes.
But victory is...assured.

These foes have strength.
But I have more!
The Poison Brogs...were outmatched.

Nyol Flamii fought hard...
but I was the victor!
I am improving?
I...swell with power.
I still have much to learn.
I will not fail.
Witness the power...of earth!
Tremble before my might!
You show promise too...
Must do better...
New powers awoke within me.
I use my strength for you.
We...strive.
Still room to improve.
We are stronger?

We are...superior.
Opponents tremble.
In the vitals...
A critical strike...
One hit...one kill.
It will come in handy.
I brim...with might.
It is a kind of strength...
Superbians... They are diligent people.

My duty is fulfilled.
Are my comrades pleased?

The mighty earth... I command it.
I have gained skill.

I have mastered earth's power.
It bends to my will!

Gula has...many odd folk.
You agree?

The mission is complete.
When is the next...?
I feel...giddy.

My heart...swells.
And my power, too...

The people of Luxuria...
A curious breed.

The assignment is finished.
I am...glad I could help.

I will persevere.
Everyone... Thank you.

Everyone...accepts me?
Arrrrwwoooooooo!
We are all...friends.

Our friendship... It runs deep.
Deep as...the mountain's roots.

Yeah! Justice always prevails!

Evil people can't be allowed
to prosper. I'll put paid to them
all with my fists of justice!

Nothing less from my partner.
As long as we're together, there's
nothing we can't do!

I'll defeat you as many times
as it takes, Glamorous Alfred!
You're no match for my burning heart!
Time to show the fruits of my training!

Now that's what I call an attack!
But I won't be outdone!
Behold, my ultimate power!

I feel like I'm really getting the hang
of this technique. I'm ready to deal out
judgment to a thousand foes!

I can feel the passion in your heart!
Yeah! You're getting me heated up too!

There's nothing like an Estral Steak!
It's fuel for the fire in my heart!

I'll always stay true to the
justice I believe in!

Daaaamn, you're good!
I need to work harder myself!
My power is the power to protect!

You can count on me, partner.
I'm always here for you!

I feel like I can protect everyone!
Isn't that right, partner?

Time to mount a counterattack.
I'll show them all what I can do!

We can't miss this opportunity.
Come on, let's do this!

You see that?! That's the power
of friendship and justice!
Time for a decisive strike!

My fists burn with blue flames!
I will hear no arguments!

A good offense is the best defense!
There's no stopping us!
This is no challenge for us!
Yeah! We're on fire!
We are the ultimate fighters!

My heart is burning with the
desire for justice!

If something seems too good to be true,
it usually is. Keep your wits about you!

Protecting the weak from the menace
of the strong! That's my way of justice!

Never forget to hold on to the
flame of justice in your heart!
I won't let anyone suffer again!
We're the ultimate partners, you and I!

All right! I feel a new power
waiting to be unleashed!

Let's show them all the
meaning of justice!
We're the ultimate partners, you and I!

All right! Now I can unleash the
true depths of my power!

Those Nomad Rhinon were
a rowdy bunch!

I could make an incredible pot
roast with this Flow Bunnit meat.
Look forward to that!

Grad Gogol... Now that's one enemy
I won't be forgetting any time soon.

The Organl Griffox must be breeding
like Bunnits!

Bobbile Brogs are giving folk hassle,
are they? Shame. Their expressions
are hilarious!

You know, come to think of it, how are
Sloam Runners and Chituk Rapchors
different, exactly? They look identical!

There was no way we were leaving
those Vint Griffox unchecked.

Remind me never to get on a Berserker
Mammut's bad side again.

Poor Massido Ardun.
It knew no wrong...

Someday, I'll find a way to tame a
Segel Ansel and fly around Alst!

Bland Upa are tenacious lil' critters.
You've gotta be to live in these harsh
conditions.

I can tell this is going to be the
beginning of a beautiful friendship!

I reckon Homura could make something
delicious out of this River Bunnit meat!

I wonder where Buma Hiln get those
funny objects they carry in their beaks?

I thought you might be able use
a Broom Icicle as an actual broom.
Alas, it was not to be...

We really would have been better off
letting Superbia take that Tempest
Pterix down with one of their gunships.

No more Nuruba Upa! Invidia should
probably thank us for that.

Stream Navy swim around so quickly.
They kept slipping through my hands!
Arno Kapiba look so warm and cozy...
Whew. Sarabashi Ropl mean business!

I can't imagine what you'd use
Rainbow Bugs for...

Yurem Puffot plumage is just
spectacular. Just...wow.

I bet Klim Anlood are lovely and soft
to the touch.

Can't say I enjoy the whole skin-
shedding thing Growsa Aspar do.
They really make life difficult!

Come on, Nia, there's people in need.
We've gotta do our part!

We could never turn down a request
from Iyasaki now, could we, Rex?

Seems like a hard life, living in Luxuria,
Zeke. I'll do whatever I can to make it
a little easier!

Superbia's future's not looking too
bright, is it, Meleph? If there's anything
I can help you with, just tell me.
Yeah, I think I'm pretty keen on bugs!

Killi-Killi Killifish...
Do I want to know what you use
those for?

Nitrotoluite's used to make bullets,
as I recall. Useful stuff!

Is Emerald Snow pretty, or is it pretty?!
Makes me want to start hunting for
precious stones...

Sand Salmon is a prized commodity
to the Superbians, you know.

Glad to see we get on well with each
other!
We really have to share more stories.

Oh, hey!
We're pretty tight friends now, huh?

We have absolute faith in each other
now, right? Not just a one-way dealio?

Attack is the best form of defense!
Isn't that right?

I'll try and brighten things
up even more!
I'm really getting the hang of things!

I might not measure up to Homura,
but I'm not doing too badly if
I say so myself!

Practice makes perfect!
Right?

Intensive training is hard work...
Homura, tell me your secrets!

I think slow and steady is more
my style than some kind of
intensive all-in-one-go approach.

Huh. Well, I guess even slow and
steady improvement isn't going
to do much for this anymore.
You mess with fire, you get burned!

Practice, practice, practice! That's the
only route to success!

Actually, I'm trying to work on
hiding my flames so I don't set
fire to quite as many things.

Ah, forget it. There's no hiding
this fire!

I think I'm better at attacking
than healing, to be honest!

You don't need to heal if the enemy
is already dead before they hit you!

Finishing off an enemy really gets
the blood pumping. Or should that
be "boiling"?

One day I want to hold a big fireworks
festival and invite Homura. Imagine if she
came! I think I'd explode with joy!

I wish I could fight alongside
Homura forever...

Homura is my hero. I admire her so much!
Hikari? Who's that...?
...Oh, *her*...

When I'm around Homura, I worry about
disappointing her. When I'm around
Hikari, I worry about making her mad.

Hikari is pretty sharp around the
edges, but actually I think she might
be quite kind at heart... Maybe?

Even though I've got this ball thing,
I'm so bad at healing... Maybe I'm just
a dumb stupid weirdo...

I wonder what my Affinity is
with Homura...

If you're stubborn enough, you can
take any hit. You just say "I don't
wanna die today!"

When everyone combines their power,
we're like an unstoppable rocket!
I'm giving it all I've got!

Homura is my idea of the perfect Blade.
I want to be just like her!

I may have messed up before, but
I want to keep trying to become as
strong and as kind as my hero Homura!

Hikari is...well, she's mean. That's
all there is to it. I don't respect her
at all!

I'm sorry for always acting on impulse.
It's just that when my emotions start to
burn, there's nothing I can do!

I'm still growing, but I'm hot on
Homura's tail, believe me!

Having someone around to look up to
really helps your personal growth!

Yes, yes, I get it. Don't set off fireworks
where veggies and fruit could be hurt...
I won't, I promise!

Eating Homura's cooking makes me feel
like I can take on the world!
Homura's cooking really energizes me!

So these are Adel's Supercakes...
Eating them makes me feel like
I've gone up in the world somehow!

Now this is a true Homura masterpiece!
So sweet and tasty! Her greatest
creation! ...Oh, it's from a recipe?

As soon as I make up my mind to do
something, I just forge ahead and do it.
I hope I don't cause too much trouble...

If I grow closer to everyone, that means
I'll grow closer to Homura!

I feel like I've really gotten to know
everyone. Is the feeling mutual?

I respect you almost as much as
I respect Homura!

I'll have to work harder than this.
Repetition is at the heart of learning.
I can still squeeze more out of it...

My Sliding Slinger move is now
a thing of beauty. Don't you think?
I'll need some more practice with this.
I think it can get even better.

I've got a good baseline, now it's time
to iterate.

Hundred Shells is now a force
to be reckoned with.

I'll polish up the finer points,
then it'll really sing.
Needs more firepower.
It'll be ready soon.

There's no enemy who can withstand
my Violent Streak, not in my world,
and not in this one, either.

I don't care if you call it natural
selection, I still feel bad about killing
gentle herbivore indigens...

When you're fighting flying indigens,
that's when guns really shine... But you
really like your melee weapons, huh.

Phew, if those things attacked NLA...
I'll have to revamp our defenses the
next time I'm back.

If I had my Skell, that would've been
no contest... But as things stand, at
least it made for a nice workout.

The technology looked profoundly
mysterious at a glance... I bet if Lin
was here, she'd be all over it.

Tirkins, huh? I wonder if we could
befriend them like we did the Ma-non...

Our teamwork skills have been tried,
and we passed with flying colors.

The soldiers from Meleph's homeland
are a competent bunch. Great small-
unit tactics, impressive leadership.

Alst's indigens tend towards the
smaller end of the spectrum...
Perfect for target practice.

Annoying pests...
I'm so glad the beaches near NLA
are free from this kind of menace.

That duo was no summer picnic.
They complemented each other...
I have to respect that.

I'm still in awe of that simulator.
I need to question the Archsage,
and get him to spill its secrets...

Gula looks so much like Noctilum...
I wish I could explore it methodically.

I've developed a soft spot for this land.
Let's not leave yet,okay?

Even though the technology in Alst
isn't very advanced, Blades' power can
wreak such destruction... It's sobering.

A solemn and mystical place...
I especially liked that single shaft of
light. I wonder where it came from...

I've never seen a place like it in my life.
Alst hides many unplumbed mysteries
still - I hope we can explore together!

That's not an indigen you'd even meet
on Mira. So small, yet so ferocious...

I'm a fan of all these small-sized
indigens you've got. It's nice when
a fight ends this quickly.

That indigen was unexpectedly cute,
and I bet it'd yield some excellent
materials...

I wonder what the lifespan of one of
those indigens could be... We should
set up a study.

This would be so much easier
if we had Skells.

It's said that using Clarity Moss gives
you clarity... But I think in Noctilum,
it'd just make things worse!

The Dragon Incense is used to make
medicine, right? I'm lucky enough not
to need it, but it's still fascinating.

That's one disgusting-looking fish...
I don't think there's any sea life
this grotesque on Mira...

Such a beautiful stone...
It feels very...pure, somehow.

To think that an organism would find a
way to flourish in this environment...
I guess life really does find a way.

You use some fascinating techniques,
I'll give you that.

I think I understand the role that
Blades play in this world...

What do you think?
From BLADE to Blade, eh?

Meeting you all has taught me a lot.
I'll never forget this. Thank you.
